title.gd: Atlas nan Daoine is nan Àiteachan

description.en: A bilingual atlas exploring history, geology, geography, nature, society, and infrastructure.
description.gd: Atlas dà-chànanach a’ rannsachadh eachdraidh, clach-eòlas, cruinn-eòlas, nàdar, comann-sòisealta agus bun-structair.

render.en:
Welcome to the Atlas of People and Place

This bilingual atlas invites you to explore and enrich Scotland’s landscapes, histories, and communities. Click on the map to add details about historic sites, natural features, geology, and more. Your contributions help build a shared resource for everyone.

How to contribute:
1. Zoom to a place you know — or tap the locate me button to jump to your current location.
2. Click a feature or add a new one.
3. Start with a photo if you can, then answer the short question.
4. Save your edit — it will appear on the map for others.

Need more help? Read the instructions in English | Leugh an stiùireadh sa Ghàidhlig

Thank you for helping grow this open, collaborative atlas.
render.gd:
Fàilte don Atlas nan Daoine is nan Àiteachan

Tha an atlas dà-chànanach seo gad thàladh gus cruthan-tìre, eachdraidh agus coimhearsnachdan na h-Alba a rannsachadh agus a neartachadh. Briog air a’ mhapa gus mion-fhiosrachadh a chur ris mu làraichean eachdraidheil, feartan nàdair, clach-eòlas agus barrachd. Tha na tabhartasan agad a’ cuideachadh gus goireas co-roinnte a thogail airson a h-uile duine.

Mar a chuireas tu ri chèile:
1. Sùm gu àite a tha thu eòlach air — no cleachd am putan lorg mi gus leum gu d’ àite làithreach.
2. Briog air feart no cuir fear ùr ris.
3. Tòisich le dealbh ma ghabhas e dèanamh, an uair sin freagair a’ cheist ghoirid.
4. Sàbhail an deasachadh agad — nochdaidh e air a’ mhapa do chàch.

Feumaidh tu barrachd cuideachaidh? Read in English | Leugh sa Ghàidhlig

Mòran taing airson do chuideachadh le bhith a’ fàs an atlas cho-obrachail seo.
